summary: Edited each part of Alduin to make it much more fearsome and unique. This mod is changes to meshes so you can use any texture mod you want to.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This is new meshes for Alduin to make it much more fearsome and unique. Since this is only changes to meshes, you can use any texture mod you want to.[/size]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?
[/size][/color][size=3]Automatically with manager or manually dragging it to your data folder.
[/size][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]


[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Q&A[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]Wait... Didn't you already make this?
[/size][size=5]A: [/size][size=3]Uhhh... http://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/2l9mrd/sorry_to_everyone_who_used_my_alduin_reborn/

[/size][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]So what are the changes?
[/size][size=5]A: [/size][size=3]From wings to nails, I edited each part of Alduin to make it unique.[/size]
[size=5]Q:[/size][size=3] Will this mod make Alduin also stronger and faster? Just like setscale command.[/size]
[size=5]A:[/size][size=3] No it won't.

[/size][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]Will there be any other REBORN mods?
[/size][size=5]A: [/size][size=3]Dragons REBORN is my next project. Infect I gave a shot to Skeletal dragon and Paarthurnax but those went horribly wrong. Skeletal was invisible and then it crashed the game. Paarthurnax was also invisible, I've no idea why.

[/size][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]I can't see a difference.
[/size][size=5]A: [/size][size=3]Not this time!
[/size][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]lol jk  
[/size]  
[/font][center][color=#6aa84f][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Old Video of The Old Version[/size][/font][/color][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][youtube]VaF1Ga1deK4[/youtube]
[color=#6aa84f][size=5]New Version When Compared With Old One
[/size][/color][size=4]Bigger tale,
Bigger nails,
Longer&Bigger spikes,
Sharper&Longer spikes on wings,
Taller teeths, 
10/10.[/size][/font][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
